short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pull out the psychological design tricks that e-commerce websites use to influence your behavior online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everything on the internet is fighting for your attention, and sometimes it’s tiring to notice the signals between a marketing intent and what you’re actually looking for.

This tool aims to put less pressure on your cognition by silencing the alarm signals from various websites. These includes:
- pull out discounted prices and sale badges from product lists, knowing that most of the products are not on a relevant discount
- downplay sponsored results that usually appear at the top of the list

How it’s working?
This extension uses custom CSS rules that hide or adjust the site elements.
